item.description: arXiv:2511.03772v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present an extended Greek Dialectal Dataset (GRDD+) 1that complements the existing GRDD dataset with more data from Cretan, Cypriot, Pontic and Northern Greek, while we add six new varieties: Greco-Corsican, Griko (Southern Italian Greek), Maniot, ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> experiment, fine-tuning, LLM, model, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
